title: Intoxicating Magic
description: Willow Rhoswen is finally coming to terms with the fact that Talisen—the man she thought was the love of her life—has left town, when his new superhuman drug becomes toxic and people's lives are on the line. Now she has to go after him before it's too late.But when she gets to her home town of Eureka, California, Willow learns the truth of her brother's death and once again finds herself in a power struggle between her brother's murderer and the Cryrique vampires of New Orleans. With only her wolf, Link, and herself to count on, Willow's determined to end the political war once and for all, all while saving her friends and getting her happily ever after.
author: Deanna Chase
